walkthroughDesc1: One Token for Every Transaction more easy and secure.
walkthroughDesc2: More fast to manage and approve task from many channel.
walkthroughDesc3: You can real time access financial account anywhere and anytime.
OTPSend: We have sent a message containing an OTP Code to
OTPWrong: OTP Code you entered is incorrect
OTPLockDesc: You have entered wrong OTP code 5 times. Your account is now locked for 3 hours, please try again later.
